changelog.md.S'il n'y a pas d'information sur la mise: If there is no information on the update, it means that it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Support de la mise à jour du firmware zi: Zigbee firmware update support on Luna
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la gestion des g: Fixed a bug in group management
changelog.md.Possibilité de choisir la version de zig: Possibility to choose the version of zigbee2mqtt
changelog.md.Pour ceux ayant des soucis de module inj: For those having problems with an unreachable module following the previous update, you must restore a jeedom backup from before the update then redo the update
changelog.md.Je m'excuse sincerement pour ce bug qui: I sincerely apologize for this bug which occurs to some of you, it comes from an unexpected function of zigbee2mqtt which I do not have on my different labs
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la version de zi: Fixed a bug on the zigbee2mqtt version
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la mise a jour d: Fixed a bug when updating dependencies (zigbee2mqtt) if you restored jeedom
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug qui empechait la cré: Fixed a bug that prevented orders from being created correctly
changelog.md.Possibilité de configurer le port d'écou: Ability to configure the listening port of zigbee2mqtt
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur les commandes: Fixed an issue with color type commands
changelog.md.Correction sur la generation des command: Correction on the generation of commands which could not work in certain cases
changelog.md.Possibilité pour les box atlas ou les co: Possibility for atlas boxes or Elelabs type controllers to update the firmware from jeedom
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis lors de l'envoi d: Fixed a problem when sending a positioning command (shutter type
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis de detection de c: Fixed a problem with detecting certain modules (including profalux

index.md.Documentation en cours de rédaction, n'h: Documentation in progress, do not hesitate to come back to see from time to time to learn more about this plugin
index.md.compatibilité généralisée avec les diffé: generalized compatibility with different Zigbee hardware
index.md.se base sur l'excellent travail effectué: is based on the excellent work done around
index.md.Il permet de communiquer avec les contrô: It allows communication with the following Zigbee controllers
index.md.Il n'est pas nécessaire d'installer l'ap: It is not necessary to install the deCONZ app
index.md.Testé et validé par l'équipe Jeedom: Tested and validated by the Jeedom team
index.md.Avant toute chose il faut mettre à jour: First of all you must update the firmware of your key (especially for EZSP, popp key in particular) otherwise the demon cannot work you must refer to the manufacturer's documentation
index.md.N'hésitez pas à consulter la page offici: Do not hesitate to consult the official Zigbee2mqtt page to find the firmware available for your key
index.md.De plus, le plugin est doté de nombreux: In addition, the plugin is equipped with many tools allowing
index.md.Du à la valse des firmware\/hardware cot: Due to the waltz of firmware / hardware on the manufacturer side and possible bugs in their firmware (without necessarily having the possibility of updating it from Jeedom because most manufacturers do not communicate them), it is possible that a module marked compatible only partially (a button that does not work, or no difference between the up and down button, no rise in CO2 or a module sensor
index.md.Nous ne pouvons malheureusement pas vous: Unfortunately, we cannot warn you in advance in the list because
index.md.nous n'avons pas forcement le module en: we don't necessarily have the module in question, many modules are added by user feedback
index.md.d'une semaine à l'autre le module peut a: from one week to another the module may have changed (new hardware, new firmware or even a new module that has not changed its name
index.md.En aucun cas Jeedom ne pourra etre tenu: Under no circumstances can Jeedom be held responsible in the event of a missing function (or even a module not working) when it is indicated as compatible, we are subject to the changes imposed by the manufacturer like you
index.md.utilise des dépendances qu'il faudra ins: uses dependencies that must be installed first (depending on your system, this may take several hours)
index.md.Le plugin utilise le protocole MQTT pour: The plugin uses the MQTT protocol to chat with Jeedom; it is therefore necessary to have the MQTT manager plugin installed and correctly configured (in practice, if this is not the case, Jeedom should do everything on its own
index.md.Une fois les dépendances installées, vou: Once the dependencies are installed, you can configure a Zigbee controller by entering
index.md.Vous pouvez dans la configuration du plu: You can in the plugin configuration
index.md.Choisir la version de zigbee2mqtt en met: Choose the version of zigbee2mqtt by simply putting the version number in the field provided for (a button next to this field allows you to see the versions available
index.md.Ensuite il suffit de sauvegarder puis re: Then just save then restart the dependencies
index.md.Le plugin vous indique aussi si vous ave: The plugin also tells you if you have (at least) the version recommended by jeedom, it is not obligatory but recommended to be in this version or higher
index.md.Vous pouvez changer le port de d'écoute: You can change the listening port of the zigbee2mqtt interface (it is not recommended to touch this unless you know what you are doing
index.md.Il est possible pour les controleur EZSP: It is possible for EZSP Elelabs controllers to update the firmware
index.md.Il existe 2 modes pour le plugin: There are 2 modes for the plugin
index.md.local, tout est sur votre Jeedom, c'est: local, everything is on your Jeedom, this is the recommended mode
index.md.Pour les utilisateurs avancés, il est po: For advanced users, it is possible to use remote mode; in this case Jeedom does not manage Zigbee2mqtt, it must be installed by you (usually on a docker on jeedom or on another machine
index.md.Attention en mode distant il faut que Mq: Attention in remote mode it is necessary that Mqtt manager and Zigbee2mqtt are connected to the same brocker mqtt (mosquitto
index.md.Lors de la premiere utilisation si vous: During the first use if you are in local mode it is ABSOLUTELY necessary to launch the dependencies (even if ok
index.md.A noter que pour mettre a jour zigbee2mq: Note that to update zigbee2mqtt just run the dependencies, you can see the new versions of zigbee2mqtt
index.md.Pour aller sur Zigbee2MQTT à partir du p: To go to Zigbee2MQTT from the JEEZIGBEE plugin (for example to force the deletion of a module the module) you must go to the configuration of the Jeezgibee plugin then in the Configuration part, click on Interface z2m "Here" you will open the page of Zigbee2MQTT, once in the module you will be asked for the identifier which is on the configuration page of Jeezigbee
index.md.Attention ce n'est possible que si vous: Attention this is only possible if you are in local installation of zigbee2mqtt
index.md.la liste des modules compatibles avec le: the list of modules compatible with the plugin
index.md.Pour le moment le plugin fait de l'autoc: For the moment the plugin does autoconfiguration, that is to say that it does not contain any specific configuration for a given module, it retrieves the information from zigbee2mqtt to automatically generate the commands
index.md.Cela implique que tout module compatible: This implies that any zigbee2mqtt compatible module should work immediately with the plugin
index.md.Par contre cela a pour consequence de gé: On the other hand, this has the consequence of generating a lot of commands which are not always all useful
index.md.Nous sommes en train d'ajouter un system: We are in the process of adding a specific configuration system for certain modules and thus improving the commands and presentation of these
index.md.L'inclusion est la partie la plus comple: Inclusion is the most complex part in Zigbee
index.md.Bien que simple, l'opération est souvent: Although simple, the operation often has to be repeated several times to achieve
index.md.Coté plugin Jeedom c'est facile, il suff: On the Jeedom plugin side it's easy, just click on the button
index.md.après quoi vous avez 3 minutes pour incl: after which you have 3 minutes to include the equipment
index.md.La procédure d'inclusion est propre à ch: The inclusion procedure is specific to each module
index.md.Veuillez vous référer à la documentation: Please refer to the manufacturer's documentation to achieve it
index.md.du module avant toute inclusion: of the module before any inclusion
index.md.Il faut aussi bien penser, le temps de l: It is also necessary to think, the time of the inclusion, to keep the module awake (be careful not to keep it awake too much and to launch a reset without doing it on purpose
index.md.Comme à l'habitude, vous pouvez donner u: As usual, you can give your equipment a name, give it a category or a parent object and activate it or make it visible
index.md.D'autres paramètres plus spécifiques son: Other more specific parameters are also accessible
index.md.Même lors d'une ré-inclusion ou si vous: Even during a re-inclusion or if you change the type of Zigbee controller
index.md.permet de sélectionner le contrôleur Zig: allows you to select the Zigbee controller in communication with the equipment (for the moment the plugin does not support multiple controllers
index.md.permet de voir le modèle de l'équipement: allows to see the model of the equipment
index.md.On y retrouve également le visuel de l'é: We also find the visual of the equipment (non-modifiable because it comes from zigbee2mqtt) and access to the configuration of the module
index.md.nous retrouvons, comme à l'accoutumée, l: we find, as usual, the commands allowing to interact with the module
index.md.C'est une fenetre important vous retrouv: This is an important window you will find here
index.md.contient toutes les informations utile s: contains all useful information about your module (model, manufacturer, status, power supply, OTA, description, endpoints
index.md.contient les paramètres de configuration: contains the configuration parameters of your module, if there are any (often there are none so it is empty
index.md.Vous retrouverez ici le binding (lien) e: You will find here the existing binding (link) (in general you always have a line to link your module to your coordinator
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi ajouter un binding (li: You can also add a binding (link) between two modules, be careful to wake up the modules on battery when binging
index.md.Important le binding dépend des fabrican: Important the binding depends on the manufacturers (and not on the plugin), some manufacturers do not support direct binding and it is absolutely necessary to have a group, there are also incompatibilities between manufacturers (unfortunately we cannot list them
index.md.si le module le supporte, vous pouvez co: if the module supports it, you can configure here the frequency of sending information from the module to the coordinator (Jeedom therefore
index.md.sert juste au support, il vous sera dema: is just for support, you will be asked if you have a problem with a module
index.md.Si le module n'est pas reconnu par le pl: If the module is not recognized by the plugin (no command) you have to look
index.md.si il est supporté alors il faut contact: if it is supported then you have to contact Jeedom support (or write on the community) to see why
index.md.Si votre module n'est pas dans la liste: If your module is not in the list of modules supported by zigbee2mqtt then you have to wait for it to be added
index.md.L'équipe Jeedom se réserve le droit de r: The Jeedom team reserves the right to refuse any integration request
index.md.Il est toujours préférable d'opter pour: It is always better to opt for equipment whose compatibility is already confirmed
index.md.sont les mises à jour des firmwares des: are the firmware updates of the modules
index.md.Le processus peut prendre un certain tem: The process can take some time (several hours depending on the number of modules) but allows better reliability of the Zigbee network in general
index.md.Pour être en mesure de mettre à jour un: To be able to update a module, the manufacturer must communicate its firmware
index.md.les firmwares sont directement mis à dis: the firmwares are directly made available online where the plugin will retrieve them
index.md.le fabricant fournit officieusement une: the manufacturer unofficially provides an update in some cases
index.md.Pour tous les autres, il n'est pas possi: For all others, it is not possible to update the module from the plugin
index.md.Vous pouvez depuis la configuration du m: You can from the module configuration request a firmware verification as well as launch the OTA update
index.md.La technologie Greenpower est normalemen: Greenpower technology is normally supported by the plugin; it is being qualified by Jeedom SAS
index.md.La constitution d'un réseau Zigbee de bo: The constitution of a good quality Zigbee network is greatly helped by the tools made available in the plugin
index.md.Dirigez-vous vers la page générale du pl: Go to the general page of the plugin listing all the equipment and click on the button
index.md.pour accéder à différentes informations: to access various information and actions around the Zigbee network as well as the representative graph of it
index.md.C'est la que vous retrouvez toute les co: This is where you find all the advanced configurations of Zigbee2mqtt, be careful it's a list generated from Zigbee2mqtt (hence the fact that everything is in English
index.md.Le graphique du réseau permet d'avoir un: The network graph provides an overview of the Zigbee network and the quality of communications with the different modules
index.md.Pensez bien a lancer une mise à jour de: Remember to launch an update from time to time (it takes about ten minutes and can slow down your zigbee network), once the update is done, you must close the window
index.md.Le graphique réseau est là a titre indic: The network graph is there for informational purposes only and may not be exact (particularly on battery-powered modules which do not often, or sometimes even at all, send their routing
index.md.il est plus que recommandé d'avoir au mi: it is more than recommended to have at least 3 router modules permanently powered and to avoid disconnecting them
index.md.Afin d'optimiser la fiabilité de votre r: To optimize the reliability of your Zigbee network
index.md.En effet, lors de nos tests nous avons r: Indeed, during our tests we noticed a marked improvement in the reliability and resilience of the Zigbee network when adding router modules
index.md.Il est d'ailleurs conseillé de les inclu: It is also advisable to include them first, otherwise you will have to wait 24 to 48 hours for the "end-device
index.md.Autre point important, il se peut, lors: Another important point, it is possible, during the removal of a router module, that part of the "end-device
index.md.soit perdu pendant un temps plus ou moin: is lost for a more or less long time
index.md.ou même définitivement et que vous ayez: or even permanently and you have to re-include them
index.md.Malheureusement cela est dû à la manière: Unfortunately this is due to the way the manufacturer has planned the integration of its hardware within a Zigbee network and therefore cannot be corrected by the plugin which does not manage the routing part
index.md.Pour finir et même si cela peut paraître: Finally, and even if it may seem obvious to some, we remind you that Zigbee gateways in Wifi or remote are by definition less reliable than USB gateways
index.md.L'équipe Jeedom conseille donc l'utilisa: The Jeedom team therefore advises the use of a Zigbee gateway in USB
index.md.Zigbee2mqtt vous autorise à ajouter des: Zigbee2mqtt allows you to add external converters (to support modules not officially supported
index.md.Pour ajouter un convertisseurs externe i: To add an external converter, simply in the plugin configuration (Plugin -> Plugin management -> Jeezigbee) click on the "Edit" button at the converter line and drop/edit your converter in the folder that jeedom gives you. watch
index.md.Le support ne couvre pas la partie créat: The support does not cover the creation/use part of external converters
index.md.J'ai plein de messages d'informations (b: I have a lot of information messages (blue) at the bottom right and I don't understand anything
index.md.Nous sommes actuellement en train de tri: We are currently sorting out the messages useful or not that Zigbee2mqtt returns; but by default we prefer to display all
index.md.J'ai des erreurs bizarres sur des module: I have weird errors on modules on batteries or problems with inclusion
index.md.Nous avons remarqué qu'une bonne partie: We have noticed that a good part of the problems of the modules on battery are due to the batteries or possibly problems of resetting the modules before inclusion
index.md.Même si celles-ci semblent neuves, il es: Even if these seem new, it is advisable to test with new batteries to rule out this hypothesis
index.md.Mon module vide ses batteries très vite: My module drains its batteries very quickly
index.md.Vérifiez que vous êtes bien sur un firmw: Check that you are on an up-to-date firmware on your zigbee key
index.md.Dans 90% des cas une consommation excess: In 90% of cases excessive battery consumption comes from the firmware which has a problem
index.md.Vous avez deja beaucoup de module et ave: You already have a lot of modules and have exceeded the limit of the number of live modules (31 in general
index.md.Il faut essayer en ajoutant des noeud ro: You have to try by adding router nodes (be careful there is no clear standard on router nodes so there are incompatibilities between manufacturers
index.md.essayez de debrancher la clef pendant 2: try unplugging the key for 2 minutes, putting it back in and restarting the daemon; it's a disease known to the Conbee keys (even under deconz), it takes a cold reboot for the inclusion to work again
index.md.Vous avez un SSD branché en USB3, essaye: You have an SSD plugged into USB3, try plugging it into a USB2 port
index.md.J'ai pas autant de commande que de bouto: I don't have as many commands as buttons on my remote
index.md.Sur ma télécommande j'ai par exemple 2 b: On my remote control I have for example 2 buttons but in the list of Jeedom commands I only have one command
index.md.C'est normal; la commande dans jeedom pr: It's normal; the command in jeedom takes a different value depending on the physical button pressed
index.md.Le plus simple pour le voir et d'aller d: The easiest way to see it is to go to "Advanced configuration" (top right) then "Logs" (top right too) and press the buttons on the remote control to see the different values of the commands
index.md.J'ai pas l'image de mon module: I don't have the image of my module
index.md.Rien de grave, ce ne veut pas dire qu'il: Nothing serious, it does not mean that it is not usable or recognized, the image is just for illustration
index.md.Si vraiment vous la voulez, il faut cont: If you really want it, you have to contact support to see why you don't have it (usually it's due to a non-standard character in the module model name
index.md.Changer le PAN_ID et Network Key: Change the PAN_ID and Network Key
index.md.Une fois le changement fait dans l'inter: Once the change has been made in the jeedom interface or in zigbee2mqtt, you must stop the daemon, delete the coordinator_backup file

index.md.Attention a ne surtout pas faire ca sur: Be careful not to do this on a luna box, it breaks the zigbee key
index.md.Si la mise à jour ne marche pas il faut: If the update does not work, you should then try to do a "Bootloader Correction
index.md.Si votre équipement n'est pas reconnu c': If your equipment is not recognized it is because it is not yet supported by the Zigbee2mqtt library
